<column gap="tiny">

([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 32

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 30

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 27
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Ekundayo's Dog](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2392)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
<trait label="Minion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=109" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Companion Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=151) pg. 22</row>

**Perception** +12; [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33)(imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +12, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +11, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +8, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +12, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +12

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +3

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 22 

**Fort** +13 

**Ref** +14 

**Will** +12 

</row>

**HP** 60

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +12 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 2d8+3 piercing

**[Support Benefit](/Actions.aspx?ID=342)** <actions string="Single Action" />  Until the start of Ekundayo's next turn, his Strikes that damage creatures Dog threatens give the target a –5-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute (–10 on a critical success).

</column>
name: Ekundayo's Dog
